channel.title: Need help with my Server!
channel.description:
1. How do I change what it says in the menu box that comes up when you log in?
2. How do I make crowns visible?
3. How do I change what it says at the log out box?
4. How do I remove npc's from certain places?
Thanks ahead of time!
Oh yeah, and I'm using Cheezscape incase that will make a difference. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 10:31:00 PM[/size][hr]Someone help I need answers to this as soon as possible! ~Thanks
